project_descr: Preparation of the Second National Communication of Brazil to the United Nations Convention on Climate Change

outputs.output_descr: This Enabling Activity project will assist Brazil to prepare the Second National Communication (SNC) to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC). The project will extend the coverage of the annual Brazilian Inventory of Anthropogenic Emissions and Removals of Greenhouse Gases to the 1990 to 2000 period, focusing on the sectors/gases that have either a significant share of the greenhouse gas emissions or present a large degree of uncertainty, or both. Downscaling of global circulation models for Brazil will be developed.  Studies on vulnerability and adaptation will be undertaken,

project_title: bra/05/g31 - second national communication of brazil
